page.title: 11TREE SURVEY WERN WOOD GOYTRE
page.content: Trees are the tallest,biggest and longest living of all plants.A tree is a perrenial woody plant.Most of the trees in this survey were found in the {Wern Wood,}map reference{325/056.} There were 3 trees not found in this wood;these were the Yew found in St.Peter's Churchyard, and the Horse Chestnut and the Walnut found in my garden which is close to the wood. {LIST OF TREES} Sweet Chestnut,Silver Birch,Beech, Italian Poplar,Pussy Willow,Walnut, Alder,Sessile Oak,Horse Chestnut, Yew,Japanese Larch. (This is not a complete list.) There are also several types of conifers in the wood.The wood is very damp with several small streams.It provides an ideal environment for plant and animal life. Project by{Emma Freer}aged 9 years.
